prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {

    ],

      "Mediterranean"
    ],

    ],

      "15to30"
    ],

      "Simple"
    ],

      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Skillet Greek Turkey Meatballs with Spinach & Tzatziki",
  "description": "Quick turkey meatballs seared in a skillet, finished with wilted spinach and cherry tomatoes, served with a cool tzatziki and lemon. Mild, family-friendly, and low-carb.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1) Finely chop onion.",
    "2) Mince garlic.",
    "3) Halve cherry tomatoes.",
    "4) Rinse and dry spinach.",
    "5) Zest lemon, then cut into wedges.",
    "6) Beat eggs in a small bowl.",
    "7) In a mixing bowl, combine turkey, onion, garlic, eggs, oregano, salt, and pepper."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1) Form the turkey mixture into small meatballs (about 20–24).",
    "2) Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.",
    "3) Sear meatballs until browned on all sides, 6–8 minutes total.",
    "4) Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook until meatballs are cooked through, 4–6 minutes.",
    "5) Push meatballs to one side; add cherry tomatoes to the open side and cook 2 minutes until just softened.",
    "6) Add spinach to the skillet and toss gently until wilted, 1–2 minutes; season with a pinch of salt and pepper.",
    "7) Remove from heat; sprinkle lemon zest over the meatballs.",
    "8) Serve with tzatziki and lemon wedges for squeezing."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "turkey",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "beaten"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 small",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "300 g",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "200 g",
      "preparation": "rinsed and dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zested and cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tzatziki",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "for serving"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "LowCarb"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "ModernAmerican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
